name: Purgatory (itch) (KInggers, PyrexGames, magwazamon)
description:
"IF you knew your end was coming soon, WHAT would you do?"

Welcome to Purgatory!

In this game, you play as a wandering soul trying to escape to win your life back.

On a miserable Monday morning, after feeling ill for a while, and going to a doctor, only to discover that you have a rare and advanced cancer, with probably only a year left to live – or less.

Mentally absent, you return home to be greeted with a dark black canvas bag lying on your doorstep. An anonymous gift? You open the bag to look for more information.

Inside, you find a book, with bold font on the cover saying:

"A Cure to Everything, but everything comes at a price".

Opening the book you feel yourself drifting away, losing consciousness. As you waken, you find yourself in a dungeon deep in the bellows of the Earth.

Good luck, let's see what exactly is in this dungeon.
